document_data.name: Summerstar
document_data.title: Firefall Vale
document_data.author: [[Ed Grennwood]]
document_data.Description:
The Summerstars were considered a backwater family in [[Suzail]]. Their heraldry was an arc of three golden stars on a field of deep blue.

The Summerstar family had a seat in [[Firefall Keep]], in [[Firefall Vale]], where the [[Hullack Forest]] met the western slopes of the [[Thunder Peaks]], in the Northtrees March district. The castle of Firefall Keep was at the western end of Firefall Vale, but it was virtually destroyed and most of its inhabitants were killed in [[1365 DR]]. [[Turnwyrm Brook]] flowed down the heart of vale to join the [[Immerflow]].
document_data.Members:
* Lady [[Shayna Summerstar]], younger sister of Athlan, eventually married [[Broglan Sarmyn]].<ref>
* Lady [[Zarova Summerstar]], born to the [[Battlestar]] house, widow of Pyramus and mother to Athlan and Shayna.<ref>
* [[Erlander Summerstar]], uncle to Shayna and Athlan, brother to Pyramus and Orm Hlannan, 5th child of Rauvor and Pheirauze.<ref>
* [[Thalance Summerstar]], cousin to Shayna and Athlan, bastard son of Lady Dalestra.<ref>
* [[Ileira Summerstar]], 1st child of Shayna and Broglan.
* [[Storm Summerstar]], 2nd child of Shayna and Broglan.
* [[Rauvoril Summerstar]], 3rd child of Shayna and Broglan.
* Lord [[Athlan Summerstar]], head of house.<ref>
* Dowager Lady [[Pheirauze Summerstar]], grandmother to Athlan and mother to Pyramys and Orm Hlannan.<ref>
* [[Margot Summerstar]], maiden aunt to Shayna and Athlan, 6th child of Pheirauze.<ref>
* [[Nalanna Summerstar]], maiden aunt to Shayna and Athlan, 7th child of Pheirauze.<ref>
* [[Glothgam Summerstar]], first noble of the house.<ref>
* Lord [[Rauvor Summerstar]], Pheirauze and Athlan's grandfather.
* [[Hergrest Summerstar]], Rauvor's brother, married a [[Harper]] [[sorceress]] and commoner.
* [[Darander Summerstar]], 3rd child of Rauvor.
* [[Brezm Summerstar]], 4th child of Rauvor.
* [[Dalestra Summerstar]], 5th child of Rauvor.
* Lord [[Pyramus Summerstar]], head of house before Athlan, Athlan's father and Orm Hlannan's brother, 1st child of Rauvor.<ref>
* [[Orm Hlannan Summerstar]], Athlan's uncle and Pyramus' brother, 2nd child of Rauvor.<ref>
document_data.Servants:
* [[Renglar Baerest]], seneschal and a retired [[Purple Dragon]] veteran.<ref>
* [[Jenrath]], a house servant.<ref>
* [[Ilgreth Drimmer]], steward, former Purple Dragon.<ref>
* [[Narlargus]], Pheirauze's dresser and lover.<ref>
